text:
ScraperWiki (https://scraperwiki.com, https://pdftables.com)

Technical Architect | Liverpool, Northwest UK | Full time | ONSITE (remote some days of the week OK)

Right now we're building pdftables.com and growing rapidly!

Knowledge of Go, Python and Linux a bonus.

The average 3 bed house in Liverpool costs £141,000, five times cheaper than in London!

We’ve got a generous 30 days holiday :)

More detail can be found here: https://blog.scraperwiki.com/jobs/technical-architect/

I'm a developer on pdftables.com. Feel free to message me personally if you have any questions.
